gen:link.label:label: PEV79: Claims of pension funds on pension managers/Total Domestic is not equal to Total Domestic MFIs (S.121+S.122) + Domestic General government (S.13) + Domestic Non-MMF investment funds (S.124) + Domestic OFIs+financial auxiliaries+captive financial institutions and money lenders(S.125+S.126+S.127) + Domestic ICs (S.128) + Domestic PFs (S.129) + Domestic NFCs (S.11) -->Template 1: EP.02.01; Rows: er0260; Expression: {EP.02.01, ec0020} = {EP.02.01, ec0030} + {EP.02.01, ec0050} + {EP.02.01, ec0070} + {EP.02.01, ec0080} + {EP.02.01, ec0090} + {EP.02.01, ec0100} + {EP.02.01, ec0110}

PEV79: Claims of pension funds on pension managers/Total Domestic is not equal to Total Domestic MFIs (S.121+S.122) + Domestic General government (S.13) + Domestic Non-MMF investment funds (S.124) + Domestic OFIs+financial auxiliaries+captive financial institutions and money lenders(S.125+S.126+S.127) + Domestic ICs (S.128) + Domestic PFs (S.129) + Domestic NFCs (S.11) -->Template 1: EP.02.01; Rows: er0260; Expression: {EP.02.01, ec0020} = {EP.02.01, ec0030} + {EP.02.01, ec0050} + {EP.02.01, ec0070} + {EP.02.01, ec0080} + {EP.02.01, ec0090} + {EP.02.01, ec0100} + {EP.02.01, ec0110}
